(Beach Light) Nergal.name: (Beach Light) Nergal
(Beach Light) Nergal.description: "Nergal has been rediscovering her emotions ever since she met you. Her fire powers have also been changing, transforming into light magic."

Deals Light DMG to an enemy &  ATK↑
★ (Lvl 45) Reduces the cooldown by 1 turn

Applies  Nullify to self & Applies  Combo Attack Rate↑
★ (Lvl 45)

(Mid Summer Sun) Sol.name: (Mid Summer Sun) Sol
(Mid Summer Sun) Sol.description: "An energetic Kamihime who illuminates the beach with a light like the sun. Her new staff is specially made to resemble the misummer sun."

Deals Fire DMG to all enemies /Light DMG
★ (Lvl 55) Reduces the cooldown by 1 turn

(Sunlight) Brynhildr.name: (Sunlight) Brynhildr

ATK↑ &  DEF↓ (++)
